snippet: Pennsylvania moves to ensure that inmates are given the services they need to have a chance at crime-free lives.
abstract: Editorial praises Pennsylvania for successful overhaul of its halfway house system as it seeks to reduce prison population; contends halfway houses present opportunity to save money while giving inmates better chance at crime-free lives, but that many facilities nationwide have become dysfunctional and inefficient.
lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania moves to ensure that inmates are given the services they need to have a chance at crime-free lives.
